sentence.Network_en: Botany The hood - shaped sepal or corolla of some flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 盔状花冠(或花萼):某些花朵盔状的花萼或花冠.

sentence.Network_en: The sepal is usually green. It can protect the flower bud.
sentence.Network_cn: 花萼通常是绿色的, 它能保护花芽.

sentence.Network_en: Sepal One of the structures situated immediately below the petals of a flower.
sentence.Network_cn: 萼片:一朵花中位置紧接在花瓣下方的结构.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 花草树木英语分类词汇 - 豆丁网 ... nectar gland 蜜腺 sepal 萼片 stalk 花柄.
去除花萼 (sepal). 可见几块花瓣 (petal) 已连系为一方稍肿的 " corolla tube ", 底部呈窄管状。

list.abs: Current year branchlets , pedicels , and sepals glabrous ., 当年小枝 , 花梗和萼片无毛.
Fruit long ellipsoid , to 13 mm ; sepals ovate to long ovate , outside pubescent or glabrescent ., 果长椭圆形 , 对 13 毫米 ; 萼片卵形到长卵形 , 外面被短柔毛或后脱落.
upper sepal cylindric or high galeated , rarely navicular ., 上部萼片圆筒状的或高盔状 , 很少舟形.
sepals 5 , lanceolate , persistent , margin entire , apex acuminate .萼片5，披针形，宿存，边缘全缘，先端渐尖。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French sépale, modern Latin sepalum, from Greek skepē 'covering', influenced by French pétale 'petal'

means.word_mean: 1. one of the green parts that form the calyx of a flower
